Property.name: DCSonic
Property.HelpText:
Applies changes to Sonic's models and multiplayer costume.
"No Change" must be set when this mod is combined with other Sonic model mods.
"Trial" model settings load a variant of Sonic's model with his classic shoes.

Property.name: DCSonicAnim
Property.HelpText:
Applies changes to Sonic's animations and camera angles.
"No Change" must be set when this mod is combined with other Sonic mods that alter animations.
"Trial" has a different victory stance for Sonic.

Property.name: SonicBoardAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Sonic's board trick animations.

Property.name: DCShadow
Property.HelpText:
Applies changes to Shadow's models and multiplayer costume.
"No Change" must be set when this mod is combined with other Shadow model mods.

Property.name: DCShadowAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Shadow's animations and camera angles.

Property.name: ShadowBoardAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Shadow's board trick animations.

Property.name: BetaSuperShadowTex
Property.HelpText: Changes Super Shadow's main body texture to a silver coloring.

Property.name: DCMechTails

"No Change" must be set when this mod is combined with other Mech Tails model mods.

Property.name: DCMTailsAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Mech Tails' animations.

Property.name: DCTails
Property.HelpText:
Applies changes to Tails' models.
"No Change" must be set when this mod is combined with other mechless Tails model mods.

Property.name: DCTailsAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Tails' animations.

Property.name: DCMechEggman
Property.HelpText:
Applies changes to Mech Eggman's models and multiplayer costume.
"No Change" must be set when this mod is combined with other Mech Eggman model mods.

Property.name: DCMEggmanAnim

Property.name: DCEggman
Property.HelpText:
Applies changes to Eggman's models.
"No Change" must be set when this mod is combined with other mechless Eggman model mods.

Property.name: DCEggmanAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Eggman's animations.

Property.name: DCKnuckles

"No Change" must be set when this mod is combined with other Knuckles model mods.

Property.name: DCKnucklesAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Knuckles' animations and camera angles.

Property.name: KnucklesSunglasses
Property.HelpText: Changes Knuckles' Sunglasses upgrade model to use its beta design in gameplay.

Property.name: DCRouge
Property.HelpText:
Applies changes to Rouge's models and multiplayer costume.
"No Change" must be set when this mod is combined with other Rouge model mods.

Property.name: DCRougeWings
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Rouge's wing models.

Property.name: DCRougeAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Rouge's animations and camera angles.

Property.name: DCAmy
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Amy's models.

Property.name: DCAmyAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Amy's animations and camera angles.

Property.name: AmyBoardAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Amy's board trick animations.

Property.name: DCMetalSonic
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Metal Sonic's models.

Property.name: DCMetalSonicAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Metal Sonic's animations and camera angles.

Property.name: MetalSonicBoardAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Metal Sonic's board trick animations.

Property.name: MetalSonicEffTex
Property.HelpText: Allows Metal Sonic to use a separate texture pack for his ball/dash aura, Fire Somersault, and warp effects.

Property.name: DCChaoWalker
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Chao Walker's models.

Property.name: DCChaoWalkerAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Chao Walker's animations and camera angles.

Property.name: DarkChaoWalker
Property.HelpText: This sets Dark Chao Walker's models and animations to remain the same or switch over to those used for Big in Eggman's mech.

Property.name: DCTikal
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Tikal's models.

Property.name: DCTikalAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Tikal's animations and camera angles.

Property.name: DCChaos
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Chaos Zero's models.

Property.name: DCChaosAnim
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to Chaos Zero's animations and camera angles.

Property.name: ChaosTexAnim
Property.HelpText: If enabled, this gives DC Chaos the falling water effect that his updated model uses. This also enables the effect for the 2P Battle screen.

Property.name: DCBattle
Property.HelpText: Applies changes to the 2P Battle screen models, depending on which model variants and settings are enabled for gameplay.

Property.name: DCLifeIcons
Property.HelpText: If enabled, this changes the life icons to those of the Dreamcast version for each character that is set to use one of their DC models.

Property.name: DCStartEndPos
Property.HelpText:
If enabled, this changes the start/ending positions for certain levels to match the Dreamcast version.
If Sonic is set to either of his "Trial" models, his start/ending data will switch to the positions found in SA2: The Trial.

Property.name: DisableSpBG
Property.HelpText: Disables all special attack backgrounds.

Property.name: DCCloneChars
Property.HelpText: If enabled, the multiplayer-only characters will become clones of their main counterparts. Their physics values and special attack properties will take on the characteristics of their main counterparts.
